title: Hugo By Hugo Boss For Women. Eau De Toilette Spray 1.3 Ounces
description: Introduced in 1997. Fragrance notes: water lilies, apples, peaches, and berries, with  notes of the clean ocean air. Recommended use: daytime.When applying any fragrance please consider that there are several factors which can affect the natural smell of your skin and, in turn, the way a scent smells on you.  For instance, your mood, stress level, age, body chemistry, diet, and current medications may all alter the scents you wear.  Similarly, factor such as dry or oily skin can even affect the amount of time a fragrance will last after being applied

title: Halston 1-12 by Halston for Men, Cologne Spray, 4.2-Ounce
description: Introduced in 1976. Fragrance notes: sweet florals, wood and musk. Recommended use: evening.

title: Starwalker by Montblanc  for Men - 1.7 Ounce EDT Spray
description: Launched by the design house of Mont Blanc.When applying any fragrance please consider that there are several factors which can affect the natural smell of your skin and, in turn, the way a scent smells on you.  For instance, your mood, stress level, age, body chemistry, diet, and current medications may all alter the scents you wear.  Similarly, factor such as dry or oily skin can even affect the amount of time a fragrance will last after being applied

title: Ed Hardy Hearts and Daggers Eau De Toilette Spray by Christian Audigier, 1.7 Ounce
description: Introduced in the year 2010 by the design house of Christian Audigier, this is classified as masculine fragrance. It is recommended for casual wear.

title: Desire by Alfred Dunhill for Men - 1.7 Ounce EDT Spray
description: Introduced by alfred dunhill in 1997 desire is a refreshing oriental woody fragrance. This perfume has a blend of warm and sensual fruits and wood with low notes of vanilla and musk. It is recommended for romantic wear.
